Pham Van Phuc
Hanoi, Vietnam
  (+84)949538345    phucpv89@gmail.com    https://www.facebook.com/eris.mabu
ZaloPay - VNG Corporation
Jan 2016 - Present
IOT - VNG Corporation
June 2014 - Dec 2015
WORK EXPERIENCE
Lead Software Engineer ( Direct manager for 2 Senior Software Engineers, 2 Junior Software
Engineers, 4 Freshers )
Main responsibilities:
- Design, deploy and maintain merchant app
- Build Frontend with React-native, React JS
- Design database for iOS used SQLite
- Have training for members
- Make and give tasks for members
- Perform, guide and push member to complete well their assignments
- Deal with the accrued issue from members
Gaining Experience:
- Advanced ability to develop app client React Native used redux, redux-thunk, redux-
observable, redux-persist
- Optimize performance app React Native, React JS
- Create, optimize, manage external library
- Completed the course 1st-Line Manager Development 2018
Main Project: ZaloPay
React Native: Transaction-Log, Notifications, RedPacket, Topup, Manage Merchants Location, Billing, Data-Topup
React JS: Event Tet 2019, Game Mc Donald's 
Software Engineer
Main responsibilities:
- Create application control hardware IOT.
- Build cross-platform client for mobile (Android, IOS) with QT & QT quick.
- Connect, control device BLE.
Gaining Experience:
- Advanced ability to develop Cross Platform Mobile Client use C++ with QT, QT Quick QML
Main project:
- Tracker, Coffee Machine Control, Light Control System, ZShare
OBJECTIVE
Being an excellent software engineer who creates quality products for people. Always
improving my knowledge to update new technology. I look forward to working in a professional
environment to develop maximum my ability. I am interested in many areas including Software
Development, Cross-platform and so on.
Ulab - VNG Corporation
Apr 2013 - June 2014
Software Engineer
Main responsibilities:
- Design, deploy, and maintain for iOS app with Objective C
- Design database used SQLite, CoreData
Gaining Experience:
- Advanced ability to develop application iOS
- Knowledge on auto layout, core-data, memory management of objective C 
Main project:
ZingBlog, ZingMe, News, UBus

Sep 2012 - Apr 2013
VINICORP
